name: Dicey Faces
description:
Instructions:

  • Move -- WASD / Arrow keys
  • Undo -- Z / Return
  • Restart -- R / Delete

The goal is to unlock all the numbered locks, by standing on it with the corresponding number as the down face of the die. To do that, you can "paint" one face of the die by going over the numbers scattered around, effectively painting the down face of the die once again

You have an overview of all the faces of the die on the bottom right.

There are 10 levels (the first half being introductory levels). Good Luck !!

Credits:

- Sound Design:  was made thanks to Juhani Junkala's sound library. https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

All other art was made by myself.

No music sadly, didn't have time :(

Submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. 

Theme: "Roll of the Dice"
